title: Dice
description: Other girls may cry and mope if they find their boyfriend sleeping with another woman, but not Ariana Bolton. Not her style.She's going to give him a taste of his own medicine instead.Ariana heads over to DICE, an underground host club offering the hottest bachelors in the city, to find a man she can spend a wild night with. She hires the "services" of Luke Strutten. He has the face that makes panty's drop and a mouth that was good for kissing as well as spitting the most sarcastic remarks.But Ariana soon finds out he's not who she think he is. He's not a host, nor is he a stranger. He's the most dangeorus man she ever came across. And their lives are more intertwined than she expected...****FIRST IN A SERIES. FOR MATURE AUDIENCE ONLY.
author: Samantha L.
